data.text: @peerq @MichelleBull4 Ditto. I was so obsessed with regaining the fitness lost that I failed to realize just how debilitating the illness had been. Had I not heard Michelle's advice as a friend, I might well have heard it on a hospital ward as a patient. It was that close 😱
@LiamDuffy1607 @MichelleBull4 It really was great advice to pause and recover rather than grab a bike and smash out laps the moment I was out of isolation! That really saved me from myself 😆
@winkybiker This comes from my Strava data, the app tracks my performance, heart rate and power. Possibly not a true science but it helps me set my goals and not over-train.

@peerq @MichelleBull4 Adding my thanks to @MichelleBull4 to yours. I was pointing 180 degrees the wrong way when I thought I was "cured" of Covid. Michelle saved me from myself, and I pirated her advice on to you 😉 Good to see you out on your bike again too.👍
@peerq @LiamDuffy1607 This is good to see.  Glad I could help. 🚵‍♀️
And I really want to thank @MichelleBull4 for her words of advice and @LiamDuffy1607 for his encouragement post-Covid! 👍
